description:
Hata gets a hold of some information from the student council and plans to publish it. The student council visits Uomi`s school. It starts to get cold out, and the student council enjoys a meal together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Pure Reaction to a Double Entendre / That Happens in Some Countries / Play with the Snow, Santa`s Heirs!
Urayougo ni Jun Hannou / Ichibu no Kuni de wa Sou Rashii Desu / Yuki to Tawamure Santa no Matsuei
裏用語に純反応 / 一部の国ではそうらしいです / 雪と戯れ サンタの末裔
